pageProduct.name: Trilogy Vitamin C Energising Mist Toner 100ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Trilogy's certified natural Vitamin C Energising Mist Toner is an instantly invigorating citrus moisture mist that completes cleansing routines and spritzed over make-up, refreshes skin anytime.

Formulated with antioxidant vitamin C to help brighten, mandarin and tangerine to energise and ylang-ylang to help balance complexions, this citrus water blend refreshes dull and dehydrated complexions.

Suitable for all skin types, especially ideal for those looking for a radiance boost.

Key Benefits:
- Instantly refreshes
- Energises
- Use anytime, even over make-up

Warnings

To ensure compatibility we recommend patch testing before first use in the unlikely event of a negative reaction, discontinue use and consult your medical professional.

Common Uses

Rosehip oil's potent natural actives make it highly effective for scars and stretch marks and other skin concerns including dehydrated and ageing skin.

Our rosehip expertise ensures the finest quality oil with minimum 80% essential fatty acid (omega 3 and 6) and fatty acid (omega 9) content.

Independent clinical studies show Certified Organic Rosehip Oil helps improve the appearance of scars, stretchmarks, fine lines and wrinkles.

Ingredients

Aqua (Water), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Oil, Citrus Reticulata (Tangerine) Peel Oil, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Cananga Odorata Flower Oil, Citric Acid, Benzyl Alcohol**, Dehydroacetic Acid**, Limonene*, Benzyl Salicylate*, Linalool*, Farnesol*, Benzyl Benzoate*, *Components of Natural Essential Oils, **Preserved With Dehydroacetic Acid (and) Benzyl Alcohol

Directions

Spray from bottle held at least 30cm from face. Allow mist to try naturally. Use daily or as often as required.
